list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person or organization) declared in law unable to pay outstanding debts.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: his father went bankrupt and the family had to sell their home
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cha anh đã phá sản và gia đình phải bán nhà của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: completely lacking in a particular quality or value.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nguyên nhân của họ bị phá sản về mặt đạo đức

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person judged by a court to be insolvent, whose property is taken and disposed of for the benefit of creditors.
reduce (a person or organization) to bankruptcy.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the strike nearly bankrupted the union
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cuộc đình công gần như phá sản Liên minh
